program.name: Goodgame Empire - Non Incentivized
program.description: <p><b>Browser game</b><br></p><p>Become the lord of a castle and turn your small fortress into the capital of the entire kingdom in this exciting online strategy game. Establish an efficient economic system and assemble a mighty army to defend your realm and extend your territory. Forge alliances with other players worldwide to crush your enemies, and become the sole ruler of a mighty empire!</p><p><span style="font-weight:bold;">Target group</span>: male, between 13 - 35 years</p><span style="font-weight:bold;">Flow:</span> Single Optin: can create avatar but dont have to, fill in username, email address, password, accept T&amp;Cs<br><br><br><span style="font-weight:bold;"></span>

program.name: OLX - GT|ZA - iOS - Non Incent
program.description: <span style="color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:20px;background-color:rgb(245,245,245);">Start using the #1 Free Classifieds App!</span><br style="color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:20px;background-color:rgb(245,245,245);"><span style="color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:20px;background-color:rgb(245,245,245);">The best way to buy and sell 'on the go' and in your local area.</span><p style="border:0px;margin:0px 0px 5px;padding:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:20px;background-color:rgb(245,245,245);">OLX allows you to easily post your ads for free and search for classified ads in your local area. Whether it is a flat screen TV, mobile phones, electronics, used cars, an apartment to rent, or a second-hand piece of furniture, OLX provides you with millions of buyers and sellers to connect to, all for free!</p><p style="border:0px;margin:0px 0px 5px;padding:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:20px;background-color:rgb(245,245,245);">• Super simple ad posting: take a picture with your phone camera, describe your ad and sell it.<br>• Easily search and browse for classifieds around you using your phone's location.<br>• Manage your ads, favorites and messages on the go with "My OLX"<br>• Share your ads with everyone through Facebook, Whatsapp, Twitter, etc.</p>
